Megatron Revived:

He sighed heavily, this was definetly not good.

"No, it's not over.  He had to choose, he would be living a lie if he 
tried to make it work out.  He's not trying to hurt you, he's trying 
to help you the best way he can.  if you leave, it would most likely 
kill him.  I will not allow you to leave, for Malice's sake and for 
your own, as it is dangerous for you beyond the safety of the base 
without escourt.  You should stay, things will improve for you, I 
assure it."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> "It's Over..."she said while tears were falling from her eyes "He 
choosed her... Nothing retain me here... The best of al is that I 
leave this base, as soon as posible "
